overview:
Anthony Nelson Co-founded Mobile Interactive Group in 2004 in conjunction with Barry Houlihan and Nick Aldridge.

Prior to MIG, Anthony held the role of Senior Business Development Manager at O2 Mobile Interactive Services, formally Genie Mobile, where he was responsible for all of O2â€™s core interactive data customers, such as Camelot, Masterfoods and AOL Mobile to name a few.

In recent years, Anthony has been charged with the joint responsibility of maintaining Mobile Interactive Groups position, as the leading multimedia mobile interactive services provider in the UK, managing all mobile operator and handset manufacturer relationships in the UK, and building MIGâ€™s relationships in new territories, such as the U.S.A.
